quote: he was home on his own and listening to the sort of music he needed to listen to when he felt like this, music that seemed to find the sore spot in him and press up hard against it...
quote_letters: HE WAS HOME ON HIS OWN AND LISTENING TO THE SORT OF MUSIC HE NEEDED TO LISTEN TO WHEN HE FELT LIKE THIS MUSIC THAT SEEMED TO FIND THE SORE SPOT IN HIM AND PRESS UP HARD AGAINST IT
